name: a_storage_place
title: A Storage Place
description: A Storage Place was a long-term Automatit customer, and their site was redeveloped several times over the course of the years. My contributions were primarily heavy customizations to the facility pages, adding custom logic for the display of unit information and reservation/rental process handling on a facility-by-facility basis. I also helped optimize the current version of the site, with updates that considerably improved the Lighthouse score of several key pages.

name: the_storage_advantage
title: The Storage Advantage
description: I created several custom pages for this site, which is owned by The Atomic Storage Group, a management company that handles self storage facilities. In the case of this site, they requested the creation of custom landing pages for certain groups of facilities, which they used for their PPC campaigns.

name: xpress_self_storage
title: Xpress Self Storage
description: One of the team projects I assisted with at Automatit. I handled the coding for the home page.

name: best_northwest_storage
title: Best Northwest Self Storage
description: One of the team projects I assisted with at Automatit. I handled the coding for the internal pages.

name: tucson_games_and_gadgets
image_description: Home page of Tucson Games and Gadgets blog
title: Tucson Games and Gadgets
description: I updated the layout and content of the Tucson Games and Gadgets WordPress site, making it easier to navigate and find store information, as well as improving the user experience with a cleaner, more consistent presentation.

name: maple_leaf_storage
title: Maple Leaf Storage
description:
Automatit coordinated with a WordPress development team in the creation of an online reservation process on behalf of a mutual client. Several years after the site was launched, the client asked for an update to the reservation process, however, the developer that built the site had departed Automatit, and there was no documentation on how the integration between the WordPress platform and our code worked.

I took ownership of the update request, and was able to successfully update the reservation process.

name: leverage
title: Leverage (company newsletter)
description: Leverage was a 8 page company newsletter available in both print and online. I researched andwrote the articles, managed the layout and artwork, and even scripted the comic on the back page (artwork by the extremely talented Joe Forkan)

name: nessa
title: Northeast Self Storage Association
description: I developed a customized WordPress theme that was utilized by several self storage associations, including the Northeast Self Storage Association. The template included customized integration of a third-party membership plugin that helped these organizations to better manage their members, handle membership registration, facilitate product marketing and sales, and enhance member collaboration and community.
